thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: REFILE-BRIEF-Sinopec Oilfield Expects Net Loss Of About 10.6 Billion Yuan In 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Sinopec Oilfield Expects Net Loss Of About 10.6 Billion Yuan In 2017
text:
(Refiles with links, bullet points)
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Sinopec Oilfield Service Corp :
* SAYS IT EXPECTS NET LOSS OF ABOUT 10.6 BILLION YUAN ($1.67 billion) IN 2017
* SAYS 2018 CAPEX AT ABOUT 1.5 BILLION YUAN * SAYS IT FACES DELISTING RISK WARNING IF IT POSTS NET LOSSES FOR TWO YEARS IN A ROW Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2rTcIrA ; bit.ly/2rLvLE0 ; bit.ly/2BCOrWo Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3410 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
